original_text: And you shall hear what they say, and afterward your hands shall be strengthened to go down against the camp.” Then he went down with Purah his servant to the outposts of the armed men who were in the camp.
korean_text: 그들이 하는 말을 들으라 그 후에 네 손이 강하여져서 그 진영으로 내려가리라 하시니 기드온이 이에 그의 부하 부라와 함께 군대가 있는 진영 근처로 내려간즉

sentences.original_text: And you shall hear what they say
and afterward your hands shall be strengthened
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 네 손이 강하게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: to go down against the camp.”
to the outposts of the armed men
